attributes.name: instanceId
attributes.description: Internal identifier of the hostIPPort instance.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the hostIPPort instance.

attributes.name: address
attributes.description: IP address or network name of the port.

attributes.name: netmask
attributes.description: (Applies to IPV4 only.) Subnet mask for the IP address, if any.

attributes.name: v6PrefixLength
attributes.description: (Applies to IPV6 only.) Subnet mask length.

attributes.name: isIgnored
attributes.description:
(Applies to NFS access only.) Indicates whether the port should be ignored when storage access is granted to the host. Values are:
  • true - Ignore the port when granting storage access to the host.
  • false - Include the port when granting storage access to the host.

attributes.name: host
attributes.description: Identifier of the associated host, as defined by the host resource type.
